courses.title: Introduction to Gardening
courses.description: A beginner's guide to gardening covering basic techniques and plant care.

modules.title: Soil Preparation
modules.description: Learn how to prepare your soil for optimal plant growth.

lessons.title: Understanding Soil Types
lessons.paragraph: The foundation of any garden is its soil. Understanding soil types and how to improve soil quality is key to a successful garden.

lessons.title: Adding Organic Matter
lessons.paragraph: Organic matter is essential for healthy soil. Learn how to add compost and other organic materials to enrich your soil.

modules.title: Plant Selection
modules.description: Choosing the right plants for your garden based on climate and soil conditions.

lessons.title: Understanding Local Climate
lessons.paragraph: Understanding your local climate is key to selecting plants that will thrive.

lessons.title: Types of Plants
lessons.paragraph: This lesson explains the difference between annuals, perennials, and biennials.

courses.title: Advanced Vegetable Gardening
courses.description: Take your vegetable gardening skills to the next level with advanced techniques.

modules.title: Crop Rotation
modules.description: Learn how rotating crops can improve soil health.

lessons.title: Benefits of Crop Rotation
lessons.paragraph: Crop rotation is an ancient practice that helps maintain soil fertility.

lessons.title: Nutrient Balance
lessons.paragraph: Certain crops deplete specific nutrients from the soil. Learn how to rotate crops to balance soil nutrients.

modules.title: Soilless Gardening
modules.description: Explore methods like hydroponics for growing plants without soil.

lessons.title: Introduction to Hydroponics
lessons.paragraph: Hydroponics allows you to grow plants without soil by using nutrient-rich water.

lessons.title: Advantages of Soilless Methods
lessons.paragraph: This lesson covers the advantages of growing plants without soil.

courses.title: Herb Gardening Essentials
courses.description: Master the art of growing and using herbs in your garden.

modules.title: Choosing Herbs
modules.description: Learn how to select herbs that will thrive in your garden.

lessons.title: Culinary vs. Medicinal Herbs
lessons.paragraph: Herbs can be grown for culinary or medicinal purposes. Learn how to choose the right herbs for your needs.

lessons.title: Perennial and Annual Herbs
lessons.paragraph: This lesson covers perennial and annual herbs.

modules.title: Herb Care
modules.description: Learn how to care for and maintain your herb garden.

lessons.title: Watering and Sunlight Needs
lessons.paragraph: Understanding watering and sunlight needs is crucial for healthy herbs.

lessons.title: Pruning for Growth
lessons.paragraph: Pruning your herbs helps promote healthy growth.

courses.title: Garden Design Principles
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of designing a beautiful garden.

modules.title: Layout and Planning
modules.description: Understand the basics of garden layout and planning.

lessons.title: Garden Styles and Layouts
lessons.paragraph: This lesson discusses different garden styles and layouts.

lessons.title: Creating a Garden Plan
lessons.paragraph: Learn how to create a garden plan that suits your space and needs.

modules.title: Plant Pairing
modules.description: Learn how to pair plants for aesthetics and growth.

lessons.title: Color Theory in Gardening
lessons.paragraph: This lesson covers color theory and plant combinations.

lessons.title: Creating Harmony in the Garden
lessons.paragraph: Learn how to create harmony in your garden with complementary plants.
